question: Which committee had recommended the setting up of the post of chief of defence staff?
explanation: The cabinet recently approved the creation of the post of Chief of Defence Staff. This post will help coordinate the 3 arms of the armed forces. The post is to be given to a 4 star general who is senior to the chiefs of all three defence forces. The creation of the post was recommended by the Kargil review committee after the Kargil conflict.
